# lambdaconfig Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "lambdaconfig" {
  # region = "ap-northeast-1"
}

# import {
#   to = lambdaconfig_concurrency.my_func
#   id = "my_func"
# }

resource "lambdaconfig_concurrency" "my_func" {
  function_name                  = "my_func"
  reserved_concurrent_executions = 5
}
```
